bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Insulation Coordinatio--Definitions, Principles, and Rules
IEEE Draft Standard for Insulation Coordinatio--Definitions, Principles, and Rules
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC62.82.1/D2, Aug 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The procedure for selection of the withstand voltages for equipment phase-to-ground and phase-to-phase insulation systems is specified. A list of standard insulation levels, based on the voltage stress to which the equipment is being exposed, is also identified. This standard applies to three-phase ac systems above 1 kV.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
